com.decoded.zool

Interface ZoolDataFlow

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher, ZoolDataSink, ZoolWatcher
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ZoolDataFlowImpl

    public interface ZoolDataFlow
extends org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher, java.lang.Runnable, ZoolWatcher
    This object is designed to transport data directly from ZooKeeper signals to your ZoolDataSink instances.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher

        org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher.Event, org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher.WatcherType

      • drain

        void drain(java.lang.String path,
           boolean watch,
           java.util.function.BiConsumer<java.lang.String,byte[]> dataHandler,
           java.lang.Object ctx)
        Drain the data at path, into the data handler
        Parameters:
        path - the path to drain data from
        watch - watch (or not)
        dataHandler - the drain handler
        ctx - the context passed in.

      • drainStop

        void drainStop(ZoolDataSink dataSink)
        Stop the flow of data to the data sink.
        Parameters:
        dataSink - the data sink currently receiving data from this flow.

      • getChildNodesAtPath

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getChildNodesAtPath(java.lang.String path,
                                                     boolean watch)
        Returns the set of node names that are child nodes of the specified path
        Parameters:
        path - the specified path
        watch - if set true, will watch the path and be notified of changes.
        Returns:
        List of String names.
